title: Combining Argo CD (GitOps), Crossplane (Control Plane), And KubeVela (OAM)
description: Can we make Kubernetes disappear? Can we make infrastructure and application management so simple that anyone can do it? Can we leverage DevOps, SRE, ops, and sysadmin experience to create a system that would make developers autonomous?
